requirements: Open to nondepartmental and non-School of Drama students.
description:
A detailed survey of the history of apparel worn throughout Western civilization to provide the student with a working vocabulary of period clothing, and the ability to identify specific garments throughout history. Fall term: Ancient Greece–1600. Spring term: 1600–1900.
Open to nondepartmental and non-School of Drama students.
title: The History of Costume
